archimate:Requirement.name: SG.2.2.9b: b) adhere to a standard file or document naming convention, which includes a meaningful document name, version number, author (or reviewer) and date of last modification
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
